member.name: T:Cake.ArgumentHelpers.ArgumentOrEnvironmentVariableAlias
member.summary: Contains Aliases for helping work with combinations of Argument and Environment variables.

member.name: M:Cake.ArgumentHelpers.ArgumentOrEnvironmentVariableAlias.ArgumentOrEnvironmentVariable(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get a bool variable from various script inputs: first via Argument, then falling back on EnvironmentVariable, finally falling back on a default.
member.param: The argument name to attempt to find in the command line parameters, prefixing with to attempt to find in environment variables.
An optional prefix used to qualify the same variable name when present in EnvironmentVariable form (e.g., "MySetting" command-line argument vs. "MyTool_MySetting" environment variable).
member.returns: Value found or default, first checked in command-line argument, then environment variable.

member.name: M:Cake.ArgumentHelpers.ArgumentOrEnvironmentVariableAlias.ArgumentOrEnvironmentVariable(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get a bool variable from various script inputs: first via Argument, then falling back on EnvironmentVariable, finally falling back on a default.
member.param: The argument name to attempt to find in either the command line parameters or environment variables.
member.returns: Value found or default, first checked in command-line argument, then environment variable.

member.name: M:Cake.ArgumentHelpers.ArgumentOrEnvironmentVariableAlias.ArgumentOrEnvironmentVariable(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Get a string variable from various script inputs: first via Argument, then falling back on EnvironmentVariable, finally falling back on a default.
member.param: The argument name to attempt to find in the command line parameters, prefixing with to attempt to find in environment variables.
An optional prefix used to qualify the same variable name when present in EnvironmentVariable form (e.g., "MySetting" command-line argument vs. "MyTool_MySetting" environment variable).
member.returns: Value found or default, first checked in command-line argument, then environment variable.

member.name: M:Cake.ArgumentHelpers.ArgumentOrEnvironmentVariableAlias.ArgumentOrEnvironmentVariable(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Get a string variable from various script inputs: first via Argument, then falling back on EnvironmentVariable, finally falling back on a default.
member.param: The argument name to attempt to find in the command line parameters, prefixing with to attempt to find in environment variables.
An optional prefix used to qualify the same variable name when present in EnvironmentVariable form (e.g., "MySetting" command-line argument vs. "MyTool_MySetting" environment variable).
member.returns: Value found or default, first checked in command-line argument, then environment variable.
